Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Terminion stares.

Terminion: We're supposed to trust you?

He looked at th=
e other 4.

Monster: Grr.

Terminion: Okay. Let's go.

They follow Skulletr=
on. Who knows why? They just do...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: =
LurkerAbyss
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 1:=
32 AM
  Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


        Skulletron looked =
at the Five Felons, observed them carefully.  He spit at their feet.

     =
   Skulletron:  I've seen too much.  You follow me.  Or else, I will devour=
 you.  And I'm not kidding.  Don't speak until spoken to.  Don't try anythi=
ng funny, unless you feel like dieing.

        The Slaughter(organic) half=
 of him hissed, as slime dripped from his mouth  and body.  Skulletron then=
 began walking forward.  He slipped a gun out from a special compartment, a=
nd aimed it at Terminion's head, and then dropped his arm and gun back down=
 to his side, and continued walking...

        -------Original Message----=
---

        From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
        Date: August 04, 2002 01:=
28:04 AM
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
        Subject: Re: Character =
Debut/Return...

        The Five Felons were just strolling up when this i=
ncredible act happened!

        Terminion: Hello.

        He got ready to=
 draw one of his weapons should he need to.

        Terminion: Hello frien=
d.

        Junk Man wasn't used to being serious. Since the 5 character li=
mit started, it was tough to survive as a serious character, you just got i=
gnored.

        Junk Man: Ask him what side he's on.

        Danny: No, s=
tupid, what side are WE on?

        Mincer thought pleasant thoughts of Ca=
rdhead getting decapitated and disemboweled...

          ----- Original Me=
ssage -----
          From: LurkerAbyss
          To: nbwrpg@...=
m
          Sent: Saturday, August 03, 2002 1:07 PM
          Subject: Char=
acter Debut/Return...


                OOC:  Yesss, it's here, my first ch=
aracter in this "restart".  God, I hate this damn restart.  NBWRPG used to =
be so perfect...

                BIC: 

                A deserted stretch=
 of land.  A sky, once a bright shade of blue, was now being replaced by a =
quick moving area of darkness.  Soon, rain started to fall and showered the=
 ground.  Thunder boomed as lightning pierced the sky.  As time flew by, th=
e storm raged on, getting more violent each minute.  The sky suddenly bloom=
ed a dark purple.  A monsterous bolt of lightning struck the earth below.  =
The wet mud that was once dirt spewed through the air, as a fist plunged up=
 from the ground!  Another streak of lightning met with the fist.  There wa=
s an explosion of sparks, and then the ground started to shake vigorously. =
 The fist started rising out of the ground, and revealed an arm.  The arm k=
ept rising, and then another fist and arm popped out of the ground.  Soon, =
a head was revealed.  The figure started forcing its way out of the ground.=
  The storm had reached its peak of brutality, destroying ground and raging=
 on madly.  Within a matter of long, never-ending minutes, the figure stood=
 on two legs now.  The storm stopped just then, so suddenly.  Everything se=
emed to stop at that moment.  The rain, everything, just disappeared.  The =
sky was blue, the sun was beaming, not a single cloud up there.  Calm as a =
sleeping baby.  The figure that stood on the land was hideous.  It was almo=
st two things merged into one.  One half was metallic, almost robotic.  The=
 other half, was slimy, and organic, with a pincir for a hand.......

     =
           ENTER SKULLETRON/SLAUGHTER...
